ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] As the Everquest Turns
ygData.msgSnippet: I have one male character. I don t know many rl girls who play males. Although I find that while people tend to give more stuff to females, people listen
ygData.messageBody:
I have one male character. I don't know many rl girls who play males.
Although I find that while people tend to give more stuff to females, people
listen better to males. ie. as group leader with my female alt I set loot
order and organize strategy. People tend not to obey loot order nor to they
listen to strategy. But even when not as group leader playing a male, people
will listen to my suggestion of loot order as well as strategy. Odd isn't
it?
luv,
-Su

> I've seen and grouped with alot of female characters who were really males
in
> RL and I know there are some female characters in my guild who are males
in
> RL. So I'm always curious as to the RL sex of the player of a female
> character.
>
> Lena
>
>
> > I read a statistic that 50% of all female characters played on MMORPG's
are
> > played by males.
> >
> > However, I don't think I believe it, because of all the female
characters
> > where I know the player personally, *all* are RL females. Of course,
maybe
> > I just know some weird girls, lol.
> >
>
>
>
>
>
